Sentence.value: Even if there is no hope that the cancer will go away, some treatments can keep tumors from growing and reduce pain.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Even if there is no hope that the cancer will go away, some [[treatments|C0087111]] can keep tumors from growing and reduce [[pain|C0030193]].

Sentence.value: Your child's health care team may talk to you about treatments to prevent unnecessary pain.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Your child's health care team may talk to you about [[treatments|C0087111]] to prevent unnecessary [[pain|C0030193]].
